data.title: Unset executable bit from some thirdparty objects.
Reduce the using of selectable -> bounds by fixing and using resolutions (size) from SHPs
data.body:
#7420 , and other PRs ... we are using select->bounds and hardcoding a size which is illformed, in in every SHP, there is an Image wiith Resolutions which we could use so we get the right Size of the SHP

Selectbounds should only be used on units like UFO (TS) where the image is larger than > 300px
also we can change this in one shoot by reading the Size and resolution from the SHP

data.title: Transforming with low hp causes invulnerability
data.body:
See https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7130#issuecomment-72467231.

Steps:
1. Set `mcv` [Health](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/blob/bleed/mods/ra/rules/vehicles.yaml#L298) to `16`.
2. Set `M1Carbine` [chance](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/blob/bleed/mods/ra/weapons.yaml#L331) against `light` to `100`.
3. Go ingame and build one mcv and one rifle man.
4. Shoot a single time on the mcv.
5. Deploy and undeploy it.

data.title: Avoid some memory allocations
data.body: Very minor, but a couple of small changes to avoid some memory allocations.

data.title: Fix the demo truck explosion not killing the initiator
data.body: Fixes #7327.

data.title: Clean up the post-build commands in the csprojs
data.body: The FuzzyLogicLibrary copy is already handled in make dependencies, and the cd command is unnecessary.

data.title: BugFix: harvester-carryall remote death
data.body:
The d2k harvester would suddenly explode if the approaching carryall was
destroyed. This is because there was no distinction between the unit being
carried and the unit being reserved. To test you'll probably have to tweak
the turret missile in weapons.yaml so you can forcefire on the carryall.
- added a bool to check if carryall is actually holding it's target
- fixed harvester being stuck in reserved mode

data.title: How to add crates on a custom map (Im new and would like to know it)
data.body: I would like to know how to change crates on custom map and how the plane drop more crates.

data.title: Removed the unused movie lists
data.body: This is redundant since https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/6643 and https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/3305.

```
DatabaseReader failed: System.TypeInitializationException: An exception was thro
wn by the type initializer for Newtonsoft.Json.Utilities.ConvertUtils ---> Syste

ontent) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

er, System.Type objectType) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

eader reader) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
```

data.title: Adjust nudging for cases where no enterable cell is found
data.body:
- Randomly select one of the occupied "non-stupid" cells
- Notify blockers in that cell
- Wait until it can be entered
- Move to cell

This is related to #4736.

I still encountered one problem after the patch, if you are using cheats (instant build) the actor being deployed to the rally point cannot cannot notify the blocking actor which just moved out of the production facility. This is due to the condition that the blocking actor must be idle inside Mobile.OnNotifyBlockingMove().

data.title: Updated Break of Day
data.body: Updated at Petrenko's request.

data.title: Video installation
data.body:
`ExtractFilesFromCD` needs an optional flag for `~movies1.mix, ~movies2.mix` and we could think about if our mirror network is strong enough to handle the downloads of those files (around 400 MB each).
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/8186860-video-installation?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Added restart in singleplayer for cnc, ra, d2k
data.body:
We implemented restart buttons for the singleplayer of cnc, ra, d2k

Adresses #4874

data.title: Build Plots
data.body:
Similar to LotR: BFME.
The initial implementation may be limited to 1x1 footprints for sanity.

This issues serves as a reminder to myself so I don't get sidetracked so easily.

data.title: Enforce the copyright headers StyleCop rule
data.body: We already adhere to it everywhere.

data.title: Fixed NSIS being installed during every pull request build
data.body: To save precious Windows CI build time.

data.title: Fixed OpenRA.Mods.D2k/Widgets/MoneyBinWidget.cs: [SP2000] Invalid spacing at the end of the line.
data.body: Fixes the StyleCop violations introduced by https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7342.

data.title: Ported allies05a to lua
data.body:
I split the lua script into two parts:
One for the mission itself and the other one for the production of the "AI".

data.title: Made int2 class immutable
data.body: In addition, I added a couple of functions SetX and SetY to increase fluency (no need of painful "new" when you just want to increase one of the coordinates. Making structs immutable should reduce unexpected behaviours when using structs.

data.title: Make spy plane non-targetable
data.body: as often requested on irc and social media

data.title: Ignore designer generated files during StyleCop checks.
data.body:
Designer generated file have always been able to generate style warnings, but until the introduction of StyleCopPlus in #7382 they happened to not.

Enforcing style on these files seems useless, and they're now failing some style checks, so it would seem to make sense to disable checks on these files.

data.title: Remove whitespace from empty line
data.body: #7314 broke the build after #7382 introduced stronger codestyle rules
